thread.title: Abbie Mackenzie
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Abbie Mackenzie

author: Abbie Mackenzie
title: Abbie Mackenzie
text:
Company who dealt with the service and MOT were very good and were very reasonably priced for the extra work which needed to be carried out.
Only negative was pick up time was initially 8-10, they called and asked if 11 was ok which I agree to, the next day they text to say 12ish which I think wasn't very professional, they should have called to see if this was ok rather than just tell me. Didn't affect the drop off time though.
Would defo use this service again.
